duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide acute care to patients across various departments and units in a healthcare facility.
Deliver high-quality patient care with a focus on clinical best practices and patient safety.
Utilize medical-surgical skills to assess, plan, implement, and evaluate patient care.
Communicate effectively with patients, families, and healthcare team members to ensure optimal care outcomes.
Apply critical thinking and teamwork to address complex patient needs and emergency situations.
Demonstrate empathy and compassion in all interactions with patients and their families.

education_certification.credential: Associate's or Bachelor's degree in Nursing (RN license required)
